scripts.test:basic: npm run clean && cross-env NODE_ENV=test npx playwright test tests/basic.spec.ts
scripts.test:smoke-home: npm run clean && cross-env NODE_ENV=test npx playwright test tests/smoke/smoke-home.spec.ts
scripts.test:headed: npm run clean && cross-env NODE_ENV=test npx playwright test --headed
scripts.test:smoke: npm run clean && cross-env NODE_ENV=test npx playwright test tests/smoke && npm run allure:generate
scripts.test:smoke:ci: npm run clean && cross-env NODE_ENV=test npx playwright test tests/smoke
scripts.test:regression: npm run clean && cross-env NODE_ENV=prerelease npx playwright test tests/regression && npm run allure:generate
scripts.test:regression:ci: npm run clean && cross-env NODE_ENV=prerelease npx playwright test tests/regression
scripts.test:all: npm run clean && cross-env NODE_ENV=test npx playwright test && npm run allure:generate
scripts.test:all:ci: npm run clean && cross-env NODE_ENV=test npx playwright test
scripts.allure:generate-simple: mkdir -p single-file-reports && npx allure generate test-reports/allure-results
scripts.reports: npm run allure:generate && npm run report:html
scripts.auth:setup: cross-env NODE_ENV=test npx playwright test helper/authentication-setup.ts
